Ho Chi Minh City Department of Transport
has just sent an urgent document to the Departments of
Transport of Binh Duong and
Dong Nai provinces on the investment plan to extend
MRO line No. 1  Connecting these two localities with a
total length of more than 53
km according to the investment research report, the
plan to extend meter line No. 1 to Binh Duong
and Dong Nai is divided into three sections, the first section from
Soi Tien bus station to Binh Thang station s0
1.8 km long, total capital is nearly 3,000 billion VND,
section 2 from station s0 to Binh Duong is more than 31
km long with 14 stations and a depo, total capital is nearly
52,000 billion VND, section 3 from station s0 to
Dong Nai is more than 20 km long with 11 stations.  chicken and one

expected in budget capital, of which
Ho Chi Minh City invests in section 1 of the province.  Binh
Duong invested in a hectare section and Dong Nai province
invested in section 3, starting in 2012.
Metro line No. 1 is the first urban highway project
in Ho Chi Minh City with a total

ungulate.  small species of

threatened.  Threatened by the need to hunt for

This large-scale exhibition focuses on

No. 1 of
Ho Chi Minh City Market Management Department.  Together with

Market management forces have temporarily detained

last July was a record hot streak

Endless Polar Winter, scientists

cm December 4 music streaming service
Spotify said it will lay off
about 1,500 employees, equivalent to 17 minutes of its
workforce. This is the
company's third layoffs this year, according to
its website.  Company CEO
Daniel ex explained that
economic growth has slowed and
costs are becoming more expensive. The
layoffs are part of a
major strategic change plan to help the company
operate more efficiently.  More effectively,
laid-off employees will receive n months of
vacation allowance and insurance. Spotify is
expected to lose 93 to 108 million Euros in the fourth quarter of this year,
while it was previously
forecast to reach a profit of 37 million Euros in the past year.
This year, Spotify laid off 600 employees
in January and 200
more in

one of the most beautiful archaeological museums in

funeral currently holds 286 artifacts.  Artifacts in

are named after an

Jos, the second king of
Egypt's third dynasty. This museum currently houses
286 artifacts in six Zhang rooms.
exhibition along with about 70 Artifacts on

to tools for building monuments
